resources.string: BC Booze Finder does not guarantee the pinpoint accuracy of the information provided. \n\n This information is provided by the Province of British Columbia under the Open Government License for Government of BC Information v.BC1.0.

•	Tap 'Find Location' to find your location and liquor stores nearby 

•	Double tap anywhere to plot that spot

•	Click on markers to find out information about that liquor store

BC Booze Finder is an app to help find liquor stores in British Columbia by using the data provided by http://www.data.gov.bc.ca/.\n\nThis information is provided by the Province of British Columbia under the Open Government License for Government of BC Information v.BC1.0
